title: Remote Kiosk
error_no_token: No access token provided. Please use the link provided by your manager.
error_invalid_token_type: Invalid token type. This link is not for remote kiosk access.
error_token_expired: This access link has expired. Please request a new one from your manager.
error_invalid_token: Invalid or malformed access token. Please verify the link.
error_employee_not_found: Employee not found or inactive. Please contact your manager.
error_photo_required: Photo is required for clock in/out. Please take a photo first.
error_punch_failed: Punch operation failed. Please try again.
error_unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.

location.permission_denied_message: Remote kiosk requires GPS location for security. Please enable location permissions and reload the page.
location.not_supported: GPS location is not supported on this device
location.gps_required: GPS location is required. Please enable location permissions and reload the page.
